page.title: 15CHILDREN'S FASHION
page.content:
CHILDREN'S CLOTHING FOR SCHOOL IS OFTEN A UNIFORM. THIS USES ONE OR TWO COLOURS TO CREATE A UNIFORM EFFECT
{WINTER-GIRLS:}SKIRT,BLOUSE,TIE,JUMPER, OR CARDIGAN,SOCKS AND SHOES. {-BOYS:}LONG TROUSERS,SHIRT,TIE,} JUMPER,SOCKSAND SHOES. {SUMMER-GIRLS:}COLOURED LIGHT DRESS CARDIGAN,SOCKS {-BOYS:}LONG OR SHORT TROUSERS, TEE SHIRT OR SHIRT, SOCKS
{OUT OF SCHOOL}CHILDREN WEAR COMFORTABLE CLOTHES {WINTER-GIRLS: JEANS,SWEATSHIRTS,JUMPERS,SKIRTS, TRAINERS AND PUMPS OR HEAVY SHOES {BOYS:}JEANS TEESHIRT JUMPER TRAINERS {SUMMER GIRLS:}SHORTS LIGHT DRESS TEE SHIRT TRAINERS {BOYS:}TEESHIRT JEANS SHORTS TRAINERS
